title: id
description: defines the URI of the current instance
content: The value of this property is the URI that the schema is claiming to have.  The client is not obliged to believe this value.
In version 3, this was the only way to refer to sub-schemas (you had to define "id": "#someFragment" and then reference that using $ref elsewhere).
As of version 4, the best way to reference sub-schemas is using a JSON Pointer fragment.
Jsonary ignores this property, relying entirely on JSON Pointer fragments.
